title: Device Activation and Deactivation State Machine
name: LGF_ActDeactDevice
description: Implements a state machine to activate and monitor or deactivate decentral devices.

input.name: activate
input.description: Rising edge: Activate device given by `hwId`

input.name: deactivate
input.description: Rising edge: Deactivate device given by `hwId`

input.name: hwId
input.description: Hardware ID of the device which should be activated / deactivated

output.name: valid
output.description: TRUE: Valid set of output values available at the FB

output.name: busy
output.description: TRUE: FB is not finished and new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: deviceStateOK
output.description: Device is activated and connected to IO-System

output.name: diagnostics
output.description: Diagnostic structure to store and transfer diagnostic information from blocks trough the interface.

description_zh:
一个函数块FB，用于实现一个状态机，该状态机能够激活和监控或停用分布式设备。状态机处理以下操作：

1. 启用和禁用FB功能。
2. 激活或停用由`hwId`指定的设备。
3. 监控设备状态，包括连接状态和错误状态。

状态机具有以下状态：

* FB_STATE_NO_PROCESSING：无处理状态
* FB_STATE_ENABLING_START：启用开始状态
* FB_STATE_ENABLING_WAIT：启用等待状态
* FB_STATE_DEACTIVATE_START：停用开始状态
* FB_STATE_DEACTIVATE_WAIT：停用等待状态
* FB_STATE_DEACTIVATED：已停用状态
* FB_STATE_ACTIVATE_START：激活开始状态
* FB_STATE_ACTIVATE_WAIT：激活等待状态
* FB_STATE_ACTIVATED：已激活状态
* FB_STATE_DISABLING_START：禁用开始状态
* FB_STATE_DISABLING_WAIT：禁用等待状态

函数块还处理以下错误：

* ERR_UNDEFINED_STATE：状态机中的状态未定义
* ERR_LOG2GEO / ERR_GEO2LOG：Log2Geo或Geo2Log错误
* ERR_DEVICE_DEACTIVATING：设备停用过程中发生错误
* ERR_DEVICE_DEACTIVATING_TIME_OUT：设备停用超时错误
* ERR_DEVICE_ACTIVATING：设备激活过程中发生错误
* ERR_DEVICE_ACTIVATING_TIME_OUT：设备激活超时错误
* ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_DURING_ACTIVATION：设备激活期间读取设备状态错误
* ERR_READ_DEVICES_STATES_WHILE_ACTIVE：设备激活时读取设备状态错误
* ERR_DEVICE_STATE_WHILE_ACTIVE：设备状态错误且无法访问，设备或IO系统故障
* ERR_READ_ACTIVATION_STATE_WHILE_ACTIVE：设备激活状态错误
* ERR_DISABLING_DEACT_DEVICE：禁用设备时发生错误
* ERR_DISABLING_WATCHDOG：禁用设备时看门狗定时器超时
